content.text:
The abnormal fiber that is seen with Gomori trichrome staining is typical of: <image 1>

A. Hypoxia
B. A mitochondrial disorder
C. Polymyositis
D. Nemaline myopathy

The abnormal fiber seen with Gomori trichrome staining is typical of:

D. Nemaline myopathy
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
